short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension integrates SuiteFiles with Karbon to enable document management within Karbon. THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BETA version of the SuiteFiles - Karbon extension.

This Suite extension helps you get even more from your SuiteFiles subscription. 

With an easy to use interface, our Chrome Browser extensions seamlessly links your Karbon HQ document management to SuiteFiles, allowing you easily maintain data integrity across Karbon and SuiteFiles.

New in Version 1.0.6
- Ability to link custom folders in SuiteFiles to Karbon work items
- Allow navigation across SuiteFiles' folders in the documents tab

New in Version 1.0.2
- Linking Karbon work items storage with SuiteFiles.
- SuiteFiles common Files & Folders actions have been added.

New in Version 1.0.1
- Smoother authentication flows within Karbon and the extension's Popup logins.
